leve.name: Coat the Harm (L)
leve.description: A dragon claw to a soft stomach will speed a man towards his congregation with Halone unless proper steps are taken to stem the bleeding. A remedy known as Mother's Mercy can swiftly coat the inside of the stomach, allowing the blood to clot and the wound to close. But the medicine requires a substantial amount of gentian, which is difficult to come by in these parts and for which I would pay a sackful of coin to the botanist who can procure some for me.
leve.client: Temple Knights Hospitalier Captain Abel Whitecape
